org.cobogw.gwt.user.client
Class DeferredTimesCommand

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.DeferredCommand
      org.cobogw.gwt.user.client.DeferredTimesCommand

public class DeferredTimesCommand
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.DeferredCommand

This class allows you to execute code a maximum number of times or less with a configurable delay between each execute, after all currently pending event handlers have completed, using the addCommand(IncrementalCommand, int, int) method. This is useful when you need to execute code outside of the context of the current stack and want to limit the number of times the command is run.

Method Detail

addCommand

public static void addCommand(com.google.gwt.user.client.IncrementalCommand cmd,
                              int times,
                              int delayMillis)
Enqueues an IncrementalCommand to be fired after all current events have been handled. The command is fired the number of times specified or less if the cmd.execute() returns false.

Parameters:
cmd - the command to be fired
times - maximum number of times the command is executed
delayMillis - time between execution in milliseconds
